nodes.text: Borgleball was a game played with balls of the same name.

A part of the game appeared to involve a player carrying the ball in his arms and attempting to run it in for a goal ("He whipped one vast hairy arm around Han's waist, yanked him off the ground, and charged for the ramp as if Han were a borgleball and Chewbacca was running him in for the game-winning goal.")
